attributes.action: Age restrict the use of electronic bikes & scooters, and where they can be used.
attributes.additional_details: Introduce the requirement of a provisional license and insurance in order to purchase and use an e-bike and e-scooter.
attributes.background: Introduce a minimum age for using e-bike and e-scooters, and make it illegal for them to be used in public places (such as parks/playing fields) and pavements.

rejection.details:
There are already age restrictions on who can use e-bikes and e-scooters.

If you would like changes to the current age restrictions, you could start a new petition about that.
